name: My First NFT
intro: A non-profit instructional project for Web3 newbies
introduce: MyFirstNFT is a non-profit and non-profit educational project for Web3 novices. MyFirstNFT can answer some basic questions for crypto newbies, such as the basic concepts of Bitcoin, Ethereum, and NFT. The team's goal is to help more Web3 enthusiasts easily understand and learn Web3 concepts and knowledge, allowing them to quickly and safely enter the Web3 world. In the future, MyFirstNFT will add more languages, improve the interactive experience (especially the mobile version), optimize the content to make it easier to understand, and hope to help more people interested in Web3.
